summary: This Mod adds a completly lore-unfriendly, yet immersive Bar/ MusicHall to the Whiterun Hold.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]([/b] [/color]  [font=Georgia][u][b]Murdermiester's[/b][/u] [color=#ff0000][b])?[/b][/color]
[/font][center][/center]                                [img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61163-1-1419866187.png[/img]
                                                                                                                                    [color=#ff0000][b]( [/b][/color][font=Georgia][b]by G-Mus[/b][/font][color=#ff0000][b])[/b][/color]


->introduction from the Miester ??






[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61163-2-1419866187.png[/img]

[color=#f1c232]- temp -[/color]
[color=#000000][size=3][b]This Mod adds a Bar / MusicHall to Skyrim.[/b][/size]
If you've looked for a place to bang your head, get wasted on BlackBriarMead or just watch the band metal their brains out on Murdermiesters guitars,.... look no further.
It's all going down in the basement of an old abandoned lighthouse.
A lighthouse in Whiterun you might ask? [b]Exactly ![/b] That's why it's [i]abandoned[/i]...who needs a lighthouse without coastline. [color=#ff0000][b](([/b][/color]So two Nord sisters grabbed their Orc buddies by the balls and opened up a bar with livestage in it to bring metal to Skyrim.[color=#ff0000][b]))[/b][/color]

The band plays 24/7 the finest DunmerDeathmetal from the bowels of  Red Mountain.
       Live in the moshpit this Era: [/color]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61163-1-1419871497.png[/img]     

[color=#000000]The entrance fee is [b]10 Gold[/b]pieces per ticket, Followers go free, no minors allowed!   ...just kidding, bring the whole family !!
[/color][color=#000000]You should be able to get a free stable for your horse and a ticket outside, maybe warm yourself up a bit at our little campfire. Inside put your weapons to rest in the weaponrack right next to the stairs then meet the bartender as she serves cooled mead and fine wine. When (if..) you leave be sure to grab one of Murdermiester's T-Shirt on your way out.
[/color]


[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61163-3-1419866187.png[/img]

[color=#000000][size=3]North-East of Whiterun. It's got a mapmarker...after all you're supposed to find it drunk
[size=2](there's a map screenshot in images section)[/size][/size][/color]




[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61163-1-1419866239.png[/img]

Skyrim 1.9.3.2
Skyrim Script Extender v1.7.1 or higher
Sexl...aaah ha ha ! had you there for a second
[color=#00ff00]-temp- [/color]

[color=#ff0000]temp[/color]




[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61163-3-1419866239.png[/img]
[color=#000000][b]This is by no means supposed to be lore-friendly...[/b] It's a metalbar FFS ![b]I tried to keep it as immersive as i could though.[/b][/color]
[color=#000000]The mod started as a ''thank you'' to the Murdermiester, for doing the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59896/?]acousticguitar replacer[/url] on a quick, well, not even a real request. Coming from his ' [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59820/?]ditch the lute[/url] ' mod posts I looked around on the Nexus for a location to rock those things , ...but (again) ended up doing one myself. I wanted to stagedive ! The first tests looked pretty cool  and i thought i'd continue this even if he hated the idea......well he didn't
On the contrary - he liked it so much that he joined forces and did some stuff to it on his own   [/color][color=#dd7e6b]-let's see what we end up with ;-)-[/color]
[color=#000000]
There are times when the idlemarkers line up so hilariously with the music, i fell often , seriously rolling-on-the-floor-laughing. I'm expecting
some imagination from you, as this [u]still is Skyrim[/u] with all it's limitations (-for us non scripters-).

All the fun we had doing this mod is now downloadable for you in the files section.[/color]-starting to sound like a salesman now, aren't i ?..-


[color=#f1c232]temp[/color]



[center][/center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61163-4-1419866239.png[/img]

[size=4]Jokerine[/size] for the great cleaning set resources and doing the Cymbals (!)

-[size=4]Devangelist[/size]- for the music

[size=4]Darkfox127[/size] for his Custom Container Tutorial

[size=4]Sonicwingnut[/size] for his videotutorial on adding backgroundmusic

[size=4]BoltCutterDesign[/size] for the Metal Macabre Font

[size=4]Douglas Vitkauskas[/size] for his VTKS RudeMetalShadow Font

[size=4]Koshinn[/size] for the 'iced beer' idea

oh, and [size=4]Murdermiester[/size] for everything

author: G-Mus and Murdermiester
